com.infostretch.labs.utils

Class SCMUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.infostretch.labs.utils.SCMUtil

  • public class SCMUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    SCMUtil provides functionality to handle Jenkinsfile operations for various SCMs.
    Author:
    Mohit Dharamshi

    • Method Detail

      • pushJenkinsfile

        public void pushJenkinsfile(java.lang.String script,
                            java.lang.String url,
                            java.lang.String branchName,
                            java.lang.String credentialsId,
                            java.lang.String commitMessage,
                            java.lang.String scmType)
        Public method to create Jenkinsfile from script and push to given SCM repo.
        Parameters:
        script - Groovy script to be written in Jenkinsfile
        url - URL of SCM repository where Jenkinsfile is to be pushed.
        branchName - Branch of SCM where Jenkinsfile is to be pushed.
        credentialsId - Credentials to checkout, commit and push to SCM.
        commitMessage - Commit message to be included in commit when pushing Jenkinsfile.
        scmType - Type of SCM.

      • writeJenkinsfile

        public static void writeJenkinsfile(java.io.File workSpace,
                                    java.lang.String script)
        Writes script to Jenkinsfile and adds to workspace. This is called once the repo is cloned since a repo cannot be cloned to a non-empty directory.
        Parameters:
        workSpace - Workspace in which the Jenkinsfile will be added.
        script - Groovy script to be written in Jenkinsfile.

      • cleanWorkSpace

        private void cleanWorkSpace(java.io.File workSpace)
        Deletes temporary workspace if it exists.

      • getCredentials

        private com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.common.StandardUsernamePasswordCredentials getCredentials(java.lang.String credentialId)
        Get Standard username and password credentials from credentials ID.
        Parameters:
        credentialId - Credentials ID of repo.
        Returns:
        StandardUsernamePasswordCredentials object of matching credentialsId.

      • fetchAllCredentials

        private java.util.List<com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.common.StandardUsernamePasswordCredentials> fetchAllCredentials()
        List of all credentials in Jenkins against which credential matching will be performed.
        Returns:
        List of all StandardUsernamePasswordCredentials in Jenkins
